Generally clear PERIOD Low 44F PERIOD Winds light and variable PERIOD

Updated November     pm



Britney Spears was definitely In the Zoneand in the recordbooksas her latest debuted atop the album chart PERIOD Jacksonmeanwhile capped a week in which he was arrested onchildmolestation charges with his Number Ones falling way short ofnumber one PERIOD

More on the former King of Pop in a bit first lets talk aboutthe reigning pop princess PERIOD With In the Zone opening at number oneSpears became the first female artist in chart history to land fourstraight albums in the top slot PERIOD Considering shes only releasedfour albums Spears currently boasts a perfect record PERIOD No wonderMadonna gave her such a big smooch

With  copies sold last week per Nielsen SoundScan Zonescored the best firstweek sales for a female artist so far thisyear PERIOD Britneys latest is behind only  Cents Get Rich or DieTryin  copies and Clay Aikens Measure of a Man 613000copies for 2003s biggest debut weeks PERIOD Even more impressive Zonetallied the fifthbest week ever for a female artist and givesSpears three of the top five spots including the current recordholder 2000s Oops I Did It Again with . million PERIOD

In the Zone also debuted at number one in France Korea Mexicoand Argentina and registered Top  bows in Germany CanadaAustralia Denmark Japan Austria Holland Switzerland andIreland PERIOD The singers next world tour kicks off in March PERIOD

Though offering no competition for the top spot Blink182seponymous disc opened at three with  PERIOD The new discfeaturing the lead single  comes with six new videoson a bonus DVD PERIOD Following at number five with  copies wasthe Beatles Let It Be...Naked a rerelease of the  originalminus Phil Spectors Wall of Sound production PERIOD

Last weeks top release JayZs The Black Album slipped tonumber four while the  Centled GUnit crew climbed to numbertwo with Beg for Mercy PERIOD

The rest of the Top  were holdovers Josh Grobans Closer atsix Tupac Resurrection at seven Now Thats What I Call MusicVol PERIOD  at eight Toby Keiths Shockn YAll at nine and OutKastsSpeakerboxxxThe Love Below in the  spot PERIOD

Jackson meanwhile didnt even sniff the Top  PERIOD ReleasedNovember  the same day Santa Barbara officials searchedJacksons Neverland Ranch Number Ones moved  copies to openat  PERIOD The greatesthits collection likely to be Jacksons finalrelease on Epic Records contains just one new track  written by R PERIOD Kelly himself the target of kiddie porncharges in Illinois and Florida which has been languishing on thesingles charts PERIOD

The sales dont even come close to Jacksons underperformingInvincible which debuted at number one in  with  andhas sold about  million total since a fraction of what Jacksondid in his Thriller days PERIOD Jacksons previous greatesthitscollection HIStory debuted at number one in  PERIOD

Checking in behind Jackson was the Dave Matthews Bandsthreedisc Central Park Concert PERIOD Recorded last September the discsold  copies at  PERIOD Korns Take a Look in the Mirror whichencountered major difficulties getting to stores in time afterupping the release date to last Friday got creamed only selling96000 copies to open at  PERIOD

Other albums making a serious sales dent included the Red HotChili Peppers Greatest Hits at  Bad Boys 112s Hot and Wet at22 Linkin Parks Live in Texas at  LeAnn Rimes Greatest Hitsat  and Reba McEntires Room to Breathe at  PERIOD

Further down the charts Cyndi Laupers covers album At Lastlanded at  Tori Amos retrospective Tales of a Librarian came inat  Timbaland  Magoos Under Construction Part II debutedat  and Al Greens backtosoul album I Cant Stop bowed at53 PERIOD

Two new Christmas albums also cracked the charts PERIOD WhitneyHoustons One Wish The Holiday Album featuring new takes on and debuted at  PERIOD Meanwhile Ashantis Christmas which covers holidayclassics like  and  only managed a167 debut PERIOD
